messages.message:
Hey team, regarding Ground Truths, I'm running into multiple bugs. Just curious, what are the standard tests we do  for features within Golden Review/Creation? Some of these functionalities I assumed would be part of standard/expected behavior. If there's no standard, any ideas of what we could to standardize things?
Here's 2 bugs I reported just now: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05BJCNKZAM/p1749164681525789
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05BJCNKZAM/p1749164185725049

Not having fields show up when the splits are changed are a large blocker, blocking me from completing a GT set as Extraction is necessary to test against. It's time sensitive, I can work around it, but we should probably fix this gap asap

@Sayan or @prateek.tenkale have either of you been working on a fix for this? Was on a call with Paul, he told me because it's advanced app reextraction is disabled. But, I still think the fields from the schema should show up
Yeah, to add to that, we were able to replicate this issue on the NW env (25.18) using an advanced app. I was unable to replicate locally using an AIHub app.
I was not aware of this issue, have we created a ticket?

Thereâ€™s a # of issues with Human Review user flows, I have a list that I need to formalize. thinking we revisit and address a lot of them once milestone 2 case management gets out of the door (end of next week)
ok, maybe I can help take some of those tickets? I should be finishing my own tickets by then as well
Yeah that would be great! we can figure it out after next week
